Name: Daniel
description:
Daniel is a young entrepreneur taking over the family farm. He is very interested in the opportunities that can offer new technologies.

Daniel wants to be part of a new adventure: organic eco-responsible production. He has convinced his parents to upgrade their production with a biodigester.

The family has eight cows producing daily organic waste. Using the system, the family will grow their corn production avoiding floor contamination and excessive CO2 emission for the well-being of the next generations.

Daniel is an example proving to all the small household farmers that it is possible to make a farm a real business opportunity.

This loan represents 100% of the price of the biodigester.
